frontmatter.title: Varieties of constructive mathematics

mainmatter.p: The limited principle of omniscience (often abbreviated as LPO) says that, for any binary sequence \{ a_n \} _{n \in \mathbb{N} }, either there exists some n \in \mathbb{N} such that a_n = 1 or a_n = 0 for all n \in \mathbb{N}.
From page 3 of Varieties of Constructive Mathematics.
